# shadowRadius

**Instance Property**

The radius of the shadow the mask creates.

## Declaration

```swift
var shadowRadius: Float { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **maskImage**: An image that defines the shape to use when disintegrating from the source to the target image.
- **shadowDensity**: The density of the shadow the mask creates.
- **shadowOffset**: The offset of the shadow the mask creates.
